channel.title: NGFW on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in NGFW on Cisco Skills

item.title: Verifying DNS Lists - FMC
item.description: We are back with another post about Cisco's Firepower Management Center and this time we are working with the DNS list which if you have a protect license you can have your Firepower modules or your FTD (Firepower Threat Defense) devices look at DNS requests and deny the requests if they are malicious. These have to be applied on your access control policy to be able to use it and in this post we are going verify some of the domain names that are in this lists.
